title: 3 and Out - Baker/Browns Beef, Russ Weight Watch, Zach Wilson Tabloids, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Baker/Browns Beef, Russ Weight Watch, Zach Wilson Tabloids, Mailbag
description:
John discusses the ongoing back-and-forth between Baker and the Browns, if Russell Wilson’s apparent weight gain will make him less effective, the weirdness surrounding Aaron Rodgers super deep tattoo, and if the Zach Wilson tabloid headlines are signs of a bigger problem. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
